affiliate-engagement-1.email-line-1: Congratulations on joining our exclusive {{mailer.info.name}} Affiliate Program!
affiliate-engagement-1.email-line-2: We want to assist you in generating a profit with us as quickly as possible, therefore the benefits below have been created with this in mind for you, the Affiliate.
affiliate-engagement-1.email-line-3: The {{mailer.info.name}} Affiliate Program offers several benefits for you and your traders, including an affiliate manager, tools to help you grow and advantageous commissions.
affiliate-engagement-1.email-line-4: All you need to do is now log in to your {{mailer.info.name}} Trading account and share your tracking link.
affiliate-engagement-1.email-line-5: You can find your Affiliate tracking link under the 'Referrals' or 'Refer a Friend' tab once logged in.
affiliate-engagement-1.email-line-6: Do you have any questions or need any help toward earning your first paid commission? You may respond to this email and your dedicated Affiliate Manager will be in touch as soon as possible.
affiliate-engagement-1.email-line-7: We are always happy to receive feedback from you regarding our Affiliate Program and/or services as it allows us to improve your experience further.
affiliate-engagement-1.email-line-8: We are very happy to welcome you onboard as a valued partner and look forward to working closely with you.

affiliate-engagement-2.email-line-1: Now that you are a part of our exclusive Affiliate Program, we want to make it as easy as possible to share our stellar service with your traders and help you grow as an Affiliate of {{mailer.info.name}}.
affiliate-engagement-2.email-line-2: We can offer you high-quality, branded banners which have helped greatly with conversion rates for our existing Affiliates. You can ask for these marketing materials by contacting us via email here: {{affiliatesEmail}}.
affiliate-engagement-2.email-line-3: Make sure you share them across your blogs/websites/social media channels to help generate more referrals.
affiliate-engagement-2.email-line-4: Good luck and remember to be creative - the sky's the limit!

affiliate-engagement-3.email-line-1: We'd like to know more about YOU!
affiliate-engagement-3.email-line-2: Getting to know our Affiliates is crucial to helping you become a successful Affiliate for {{mailer.info.name}}. As such, we tailor our services toward what you and your network need most to ensure you have the best opportunity to earn a passive income.
affiliate-engagement-3.email-line-3: We welcome Affiliates with any level of expertise. To allow us to better understand your needs, as well as help you grow and develop further, could you tell us how you built your network, or plan to do so?
affiliate-engagement-3.email-line-4: What marketing strategies have you in place, or can we be of any assistance to you in this area?
affiliate-engagement-3.email-line-5: We want to make sure you have all the necessary tools and guidance at your disposal to help you earn at an optimum level with our Affiliate Program.
affiliate-engagement-3.email-line-6: On this note, we would love to set up a call with you. This is a good opportunity for us to personally introduce ourselves and see how we might be able to assist you on your journey as an Affiliate with {{mailer.info.name}}.
affiliate-engagement-3.email-line-7: Don't delay! Reply to this email with a suitable date and time for a call and your dedicated Affiliate Manager will be in touch.
affiliate-engagement-3.email-line-8: We look forward to speaking with you soon.

competition-account-created.html-text-1: You have successfully registered for your MetaTrader Competition account with {{mailer.info.fullName}} and you are now only moments away from experiencing the exciting world of online FX.
competition-account-created.html-text-2: Once you have installed your preferred application from the links below, you can log in using your username and password.
competition-account-created.html-text-3: Your username and password give you access to your live account. However, to start trading, you need to make deposit. Make deposit in your live account from your trader's room and start trading.
competition-account-created.html-text-4: In order to win in the traders competition, you must comply with the competition rules, and only trades made between the competition dates will be considered.
competition-account-created.html-text-5: Your MetaTrader Competition login details are as follows:

corporate-account-activation-email.email-line-1: Your Business Account with {{mailer.info.name}} is only a few steps away from being verified!
corporate-account-activation-email.email-line-2: Once your Authorized Person's identity has been verified and your Company documents reviewed and approved, you may deposit and start trading right away.
corporate-account-activation-email.step-2-description: Firstly, it is important to proceed to verify your identity as the Authorized Person. Please click on the KYC Verification Tab to go through this quick and easy process. The identity of the Authorized Person is required to be verified so they will need to complete this process having their Proof of Identity in hand using a device with a camera.
corporate-account-activation-email.step-3-description: We usually require the below documents to verify a business account:
corporate-account-activation-email.company-documents-3: Corporate Resolution to Open Account Addressed to {{mailer.info.name}}
corporate-account-activation-email.company-documents-7: VerificationDirector and shareholder information: All shareholders with 25% or more equity must be shown.
corporate-account-activation-email.email-line-3: We are aware that different set-ups and jurisdictions may have different names for these, or that some may not be applicable in certain cases.
corporate-account-activation-email.email-line-4: Nonetheless, please send in what you have on file by replying to this email and we will review accordingly.
corporate-account-activation-email.email-line-5: In the meantime, should you have any questions, our Support Team are available 24/7 via online chat, email or call back request from our website.

internal-ib-created.html-line-1: You are officially an affiliate of {{mailer.info.fullName}}! We are excited to have you join our prestigious program and represent a brokerage where we put our focus solely on the client.
internal-ib-created.html-line-3: Share this link with your friends, family, and trading community to earn commissions! You will receive your commission payments on a monthly basis.
internal-ib-created.html-line-4: Our Program offers lucrative pay for referring clients. We are confident that the clients you refer to us will be satisfied with their experience at {{mailer.info.fullName}}.
internal-ib-created.html-line-5: So, why choose {{mailer.info.fullName}}? Here are just a few KEY features that standout:
internal-ib-created.html-line-6: STP Broker - We operate using a Straight Through Processing model. No B-Booking. Ever. Therefore, no conflict of interest. With a long-term mindset, your success is our success.
internal-ib-created.html-line-7: Fast Payment Processing - We know that sending and receiving your funds as fast as possible makes the entire experience stress-free. Our team continuously works to provide the fastest processing in the industry.
internal-ib-created.html-line-8: Once again, thank you for choosing to join our Affiliate Program. We hope to continue to offer a satisfying experience for you and your future referrals that you refer to {{mailer.info.fullName}}.
internal-ib-created.subject: Earn The Most As A {{mailer.info.fullName}} Affiliate!
internal-ib-created.spread-the-revolution: Spread the revolution and make sure you introduce other traders to the future of trading by sharing your affiliate link, that can be found here.

kyc-expire-in-15.html-line-4: If you have any further questions please visit our FAQ section or if you would like to renew your documents you contact us directly via live chat and email.

pamm-fund-account-created.html-line-11: You have successfully registered for your MetaTrader PAMM Fund account. Your MetaTrader login details are as follows:
pamm-fund-account-created.html-line-1: You have successfully created your MetaTrader PAMM Fund Account with {{mailer.info.shortName}} and you are now well on your way to starting your first Investment Fund.
pamm-fund-account-created.html-line-2: Your username and trader password, as below, will give you access to your live account in your MetaTrader application of choice.
pamm-fund-account-created.html-line-4: Step 1: Access the PAMM Widget by clicking on the cog to 'Manage' your Investment Fund from your {{mailer.info.shortName}} Account.
pamm-fund-account-created.html-line-5: Step 2: You will need to set an 'Offer' for your Investors. The offer defines your fee for investing on your investors' behalf. Each offer that is set under your Fund can be selected by your Investors should you make this offer “Public”.
pamm-fund-account-created.html-line-6: Step 3: You will have to select the trading interval (how often costs are charged to Investors), minimum deposit, minimum withdrawal, minimum initial investment and any fees. Once you have your first Investor, you will NOT be able to change an offer but you may create additional offers.
pamm-fund-account-created.html-line-7: Step 4: Once you are up and running with your first Investors, you may wish to share the “Investor Password” below with them so they will also be able to view your trading history and open positions on MetaTrader.  Investors will also be able to view this from the PAMM widget upon rollover.
pamm-fund-account-created.html-line-8: You may wish to navigate to our FAQ Section for more detailed information regarding PAMM Fund Accounts.
pamm-fund-account-created.html-line-9: Your MetaTrader login details are as follows:
pamm-fund-account-created.subject: New MetaTrader PAMM Fund Account Created!

pamm-investor-account-created.html-line-11: You have successfully registered for your MetaTrader PAMM Investor account. Your MetaTrader login details are as follows:
pamm-investor-account-created.html-line-1: You have successfully created your MetaTrader PAMM Investor Account with {{mailer.info.shortName}}!
pamm-investor-account-created.html-line-2: You are now ready to seek out Investment Funds that you would like to join and the opportunities that await you by investing with Money Managers of your choice.
pamm-investor-account-created.html-line-4: Step 1: Fund your {{mailer.info.shortName}} Account and make an Internal Transfer to your PAMM Investor Account.
pamm-investor-account-created.html-line-5: Step 2: “Manage” your PAMM Investor Account by using the cog icon to open the PAMM Widget to review a list of PAMM Fund Accounts that are available to join.
pamm-investor-account-created.html-line-6: Step 3: Click on “Join” to review the Fund Account's details including the offer(s) being made by the Money Manager of that Fund. The offer specifies the charge(s) the Manager will levy for managing your funds so please read these carefully.
pamm-investor-account-created.html-line-7: Step 4: Use the PAMM Investor Account credentials as below and insert the amount of your initial investment (inline with the minimum initial investment set by the Money Manager) for your chosen offer within that Fund. Click on “Invest”.
pamm-investor-account-created.html-line-8: Step 5: Your Money Manager will accept your investment within 24 hours. This investment will show in the PAMM Widget under the Fund History Requests until accepted.
pamm-investor-account-created.html-line-9: You may wish to navigate to our FAQ Section for more detailed information regarding PAMM Investor Accounts.
pamm-investor-account-created.html-line-10: Your MetaTrader login details are as follows:
pamm-investor-account-created.subject: New MetaTrader PAMM Investor Account Created!

pamm-master-account-created.html-line-10: You have successfully registered for your MetaTrader PAMM Manager account. Your MetaTrader login details are as follows:
pamm-master-account-created.html-line-1: You have successfully created your MetaTrader PAMM Manager Account with {{mailer.info.shortName}}!
pamm-master-account-created.html-line-2: You are now on your way to creating a world of earning opportunities for yourself and your Investors.
pamm-master-account-created.html-line-4: Step 1: Your PAMM Manager Account is a non-tradable account and is solely used to manage your PAMM Fund Accounts. You will need to open your first PAMM Fund Account to allow Investors to start investing with you. Your PAMM Fund Accounts are where you will be trading on behalf of those investing in your Fund.
pamm-master-account-created.html-line-5: Step 2: Choose the Name and Description for your Investment Fund. Keep in mind that once you have selected the name of your Fund, this cannot be changed however you may adjust the Description as required. The name of the Fund is unique, and this is the primary way your investors will find you.
pamm-master-account-created.html-line-6: Step 3: “Manage” your PAMM Fund Accounts via the cog icon to open the PAMM Widget and to set up the offer that you would like to make for your Investors.
pamm-master-account-created.html-line-7: Step 4: Investors will “Join” your PAMM Fund Account by agreeing to an offer and making an initial investment, which can be accepted by you via the PAMM Widget or will be automatically accepted on your behalf after 24 hours.
pamm-master-account-created.html-line-8: You may wish to navigate to our FAQ Section for more detailed information regarding PAMM Manager Accounts.
pamm-master-account-created.html-line-9: Your MetaTrader login details are as follows:
pamm-master-account-created.subject: New MetaTrader PAMM Manager Account Created!

withdraw-selfie-requested.html-line-1: Requesting a selfie to process your withdrawal request is a security protocol to safeguard our clients' funds.
withdraw-selfie-requested.html-line-2: Please find the below directions to provide our Payments Team with the required selfie in order to process your request.
withdraw-selfie-requested.html-line-3: To take a selfie, you need:
withdraw-selfie-requested.html-line-4: A piece of paper and a pen.
withdraw-selfie-requested.html-line-6: A device with an enabled camera.
withdraw-selfie-requested.html-line-8: A paper with the date and amount of your withdrawal along with your signature.
withdraw-selfie-requested.html-line-10: Ensure you are holding your ID and the piece of paper.
withdraw-selfie-requested.html-line-11: Make sure your hand or fingers are not covering the information on the ID or the paper.
withdraw-selfie-requested.html-line-12: Once your selfie is received, we will get back to you within 24 hours should anything further be required.
withdraw-selfie-requested.html-line-13: Alternatively, you will be notified once your withdrawal has been successfully processed.
